description: This file defines Express.js route endpoints for a REST API, managing operations for employees, skill factories, learning paths, and a hello world endpoint. It sets up routes, links to controllers, and includes Swagger documentation annotations for API documentation.

methods.name: router.get('/hello')
methods.description: Handles GET request to '/hello' endpoint, responds with 'Hello World'.

methods.name: router.post('/employees')
methods.description: Creates a new employee record via employeesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/employees')
methods.description: Retrieves list of employees via employeesController.list.

methods.name: router.put('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Replaces an employee record via employeesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Partially updates an employee record via employeesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/employees/:employeeId')
methods.description: Deletes an employee record via employeesController.delete.

methods.name: router.post('/skill-factories')
methods.description: Creates a skill factory via skillFactoriesController.create.

methods.name: router.get('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Retrieves a specific skill factory via skillFactoriesController.getById.

methods.name: router.put('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Replaces a skill factory via skillFactoriesController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Partially updates a skill factory via skillFactoriesController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/skill-factories/:skillFactoryId')
methods.description: Deletes a skill factory via skillFactoriesController.delete.

methods.name: router.post('/learningpaths')
methods.description: Creates a learning path via learningPathsController.create.

methods.name: router.put('/learningpaths/:learningPathName')
methods.description: Replaces a learning path via learningPathsController.replace.

methods.name: router.patch('/learningpaths/:learningPathName')
methods.description: Partially updates a learning path via learningPathsController.patch.

methods.name: router.delete('/learningpaths/:learningPathName')
methods.description: Deletes a learning path via learningPathsController.delete.
